description: This file defines the NetworkTermRequest class, which extends a Request class and implements an execute method that sends a network termination response.

classes.name: NetworkTermRequest
classes.description: A class representing a network termination request, extending the Request class and providing execution logic to send a response.

methods.name: NetworkTermRequest(int requestId)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a specific request ID.

methods.name: execute()
methods.description: Method that creates a Response object with the request ID and a response message, then sends it.
